Reason: The configuration option _monitor is performance-sensitive. The creation of either a TransientJournal or PersistentJournal object in the code has a direct impact on system performance. Depending on the value of _transientMode, the choice between the two journal objects can lead to notable performance variations at the system level. The creation of a PersistentJournal object with specific parameters like journal size threshold and disk sync can be time-expensive and memory-expensive, affecting system performance significantly.
